metadata.title: CVE-2020-6811 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The 'Copy as cURL' feature of Devtools' network tab did not properly escapethe HTTP method of a request, which can be controlled by the website. If auser used the 'Copy as Curl' feature and pasted the command into aterminal, it could have resulted in command injection and arbitrary commandexecution. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.6, Firefox < 74,Firefox < ESR68.6, and Firefox ESR < 68.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
